title: License review and LICENSE file
description:
Ensure proper licensing for open source release.

**Tasks:**
- Choose appropriate license (MIT, Apache 2.0, etc.)
- Add LICENSE file to root
- Add license headers to source files (optional)
- Review dependencies for license compatibility
- Document any third-party licenses

implementationPlan.description: Review all dependencies in package.json files for license compatibility (daemon, proxy). List any GPL or restrictive licenses.
Choose license: MIT recommended for maximum adoption. Create LICENSE file in repository root with current year and copyright holder.
Add license field to all package.json files: "license": "MIT"
Create THIRD_PARTY_NOTICES.md if any dependencies require attribution
